text: As a huge fan of Canvas Curse, I'm really looking forward to playing this game. Reviews have been mixed, but from what I've seen I fully expect to love it. I knew Shogo Sakai was behind this soundtrack as soon as I heard this theme, it heavily reminds me of Mother 3. The guitar vibrato especially.

text:
Even if its a good game, its not a kirby game.

The last kirby game was return to dreamland on the wii and its extremely hard to find and very expensive when you do.

Why nintendo would do a limited release on one of its most popular LP's I will never understand.
